statements: SELECT * FROM LocationData LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM LocationData WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM LocationData WHERE event_location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_location FROM LocationData;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM LocationData WHERE event_location IN ('Los Angeles', 'Chicago');
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM LocationData WHERE event_location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LocationData WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM LocationData GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_events > 2;
SELECT event_name, event_location, SUBSTRING(event_description, 1, 50) AS short_description FROM LocationData WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT event_location) AS total_locations FROM LocationData;
SELECT * FROM virtual_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM virtual_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM virtual_locations WHERE event_id = 2;
SELECT event_name, event_description, event_date FROM virtual_events WHERE event_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM virtual_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM virtual_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM virtual_events WHERE event_id > 3 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_locations WHERE event_id = 2 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, event_name FROM virtual_locations JOIN virtual_events ON virtual_locations.event_id = virtual_events.event_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS events_count FROM virtual_events;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name FROM attendees WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM locations JOIN events ON locations.location_id = events.location_id;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT attendees.attendee_name, events.event_name, locations.address FROM attendees JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.event_id JOIN locations ON events.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY attendees.attendee_name;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) as total_events FROM events JOIN locations ON events.location_id = locations.location_id GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_events > 2;
SELECT event_id, event_name, registration_date FROM attendees JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.event_id ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_location DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%city%';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_location LIKE 'New York%';

SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email, event_name FROM attendees JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.event_id WHERE events.event_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY attendee_name ASC, event_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM locations WHERE location_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT events.event_name, locations.location_name FROM events JOIN event_locations ON events.event_id = event_locations.event_id JOIN locations ON event_locations.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM Location;
SELECT location_id, location_name, capacity FROM Location ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Event WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, date, time FROM Event WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT attendee_name, event_name, registration_date FROM Attendee JOIN Event ON Attendee.event_id = Event.event_id;
SELECT * FROM Location ORDER BY location_name DESC, latitude ASC
SELECT event_name, date, time FROM Event WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND time >= '12:00:00'
SELECT attendee_name, registration_date FROM Attendee WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-07-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT E.event_name, O.organizer_name FROM Event E INNER JOIN Event_Organizer EO ON E.event_id = EO.event_id INNER JOIN Organizer O ON EO.organizer_id = O.organizer_id

SELECT L.location_id, L.location_name, COUNT(E.event_id) AS event_count FROM Location L LEFT JOIN Event E ON L.location_id = E.location_id GROUP BY L.location_id, L.location_name HAVING event_count > 0 ORDER BY event_count DESC
